channel.title: Authors on Yunyao Mao
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Yunyao Mao

item.description:
I am currently a third-year undergraduate student major in Information Security in University of Science and Technology of China. I will still be in USTC pursuing my master’s degree under the supervision of Prof. Wengang Zhou.

My research interests include Computer Vision and Deep Learning. Specifically, I am interested in 3D semantic scene segmentation and object tracking.
